document.heading: New Convention Center Hotel Omnibus Financing and Development Act of 2006

history.narrative: Law 16-163, the “New Convention Center Hotel Omnibus Financing and Development Act of 2006”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 16-630 which was referred to the Committee on Economic Development The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 2, 2006, and June 6, 2006, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 27, 2006, it was assigned Act No. 16-409 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 16-163 became effective on September 19, 2006.
